text: the town of hallstatt with a population
of 774 is known for its architecture and
alpine landscape it's been inhabited
since prehistoric times and is a unesco
world heritage site UNESCO says the area
has retained a degree of authenticity in
nature and society that is outstanding
in the region but since 2012
it hasn't been so unique
a replica of the town has been built by
the real-estate branch of a metal trade
company in the southern Chinese province
of Guangdong the Austrian town was not
consulted and learned about the Chinese
replica after construction was at an
advanced stage the architectural style
has been duplicated although some of the
spaces have been repurposed the Chinese
replica of this church features a Grand
Hall to host banquets instead of
functioning as a place of worship in
recent years several developments
modeled off of Western towns have been
built in China in the hopes of drawing
more residents to these areas and
selling houses at higher prices
the two towns now have diplomatic ties
and keep in touch
